Subject: Apology for Unprofessional Remarks
Paragraphs:
Dear Alice and Cindy,

I would like to offer my sincere apologies for the unprofessional remarks that I made during the meeting last week. My comments were inappropriate and should not have been made.

I have already spoken with Cindy privately and offered my apologies. I would like to assure both of you that this will not happen again in the future.

Thank you for bringing this matter to my attention.

Sincerely,
Tom
